links.title: Staying Public
links.description: Earlier this month, I announced that I was considering taking Tesla private. As part of the process, it was important to understand whether our current investors believed this would be a good strategic move and whether they would want to participate in a private Tesla.

links.title: Ichimoku Clouds
links.description: The Ichimoku Cloud, also known as Ichimoku Kinko Hyo, is a versatile indicator that defines support and resistance, identifies trend direction, gauges momentum and provides trading signals. Ichimoku Kinko Hyo translates into "one look equilibrium chart". With one look, chartists can identify the trend and look for potential signals within that trend.

links.description: Still Open for Business? - Investment Insights (August 17, 2018) In this Investment Insights, Chief Investment Officer Rebecca Patterson discusses the new CFIUS legislation that provides stricter rules around inbound foreign direct investments, and the potential implications for the economy and financial markets in the U.S. and globally.
